segments.text: I notice a boy standing on a stool, trying to reach a cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and I'm scared he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl standing next to him is his sister, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, with her arm raised towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mother is right there, unaware of what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, making him the center of attention in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard the stool wobbling or the children giggling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter below the cabinet is clear, which must be why the boy thought it was a good spot to climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up and get down before their mother turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR' is almost full, which must be very tempting for the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
